channel.title: [pi] Error while unpacking config [pi]

item.title: [pi] Error while unpacking config [pi]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

I’ve been trying to get this webclient done for about two hours now…

The cache downloads, unzips, and the client runs perfectly when not in .jar format…

for some reason I get this error, I think it’s my animation’s path, but I’m not entirely sure?

once again, the error only occurs while in .jar format, and when it starts to unpack the ?config?

public static byte[] getData(int i1, int i2) { if (i1 == 0) return FileOperations.ReadFile(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Animations/frames/" + i2 + ".dat"); else return FileOperations.ReadFile(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Animations/skinlist/" + i2 + ".dat"); }

Read full topic
